title: MysteryBoxes-抽奖插件的汉化
author: 麦块の小冥
txt_content:
global:  command-invalid-args: '&cSpecified arguments are invalid!'  command-error: '&cAn error occurred while processing this command!'  no-permission: '&cYou don''t have permission!'  must-be-player: '&cYou must be player!'  player-is-offline: '&cThe player is offline!'  config-reloaded: '&eThe configuration files have been reloaded!'other:  mystery-box-set: '&eThe player''s Mystery Boxes have been set!'  mystery-box-add: '&eThe player''s Mystery Boxes have been added!'  mystery-box-remove: '&eThe player''s Mystery Boxes have been removed!'  mystery-box-check: '&eThe player''s Mystery Boxes: &b{AMOUNT}'  mystery-box-no-boxes: '&cThe player has no Mystery Boxes!'  mystery-box-already-opening: '&cYou are already opening a Mystery Box!'  mystery-box-all-set: '&eThe players'' Mystery Boxes have been set!'  mystery-box-all-add: '&eThe players'' Mystery Boxes have been added!'  mystery-box-all-remove: '&eThe players'' Mystery Boxes have been removed!'  mystery-dust-set: '&eThe player''s Mystery Dust has been set!'  mystery-dust-add: '&eThe player''s Mystery Dust has been added!'  mystery-dust-set-all: '&eThe players'' Mystery Dust has been set!'  mystery-dust-add-all: '&eThe players'' Mystery Dust has been added!'  mode-enter: '&eYou have entered the &b{MODE} &emode!'  mode-exit: '&eYou have exited the &b{MODE} &emode!'  mode-yaw-set: '&eYou have set the Mystery Vault''s yaw!'  mode-mystery-vault-added: '&eThe block is now Mystery Vault!'  mode-mystery-vault-removed: '&eThe block is no longer Mystery Vault!'  mode-mystery-vault-already: '&cThis block is already Mystery Vault!'  mystery-vault-in-use: '&cThis Mystery Vault is already in use!'  mystery-vault-not-vault: '&cThis block isn''t Mystery Vault!'  transfer-boxes-enter:  - '&aTo proceed: &7Write player name on chat'  - '&cTo cancel: &7Write ''cancel'' on chat'  transfer-boxes-cant-transfer-to-yourself: '&cYou can''t send Mystery Boxes to yourself!'  transfer-boxes-cant-be-transferred: '&cThis Mystery Box can''t be transferred!'  transfer-boxes-player-is-offline: §cThe player you were about to transfer Mystery Boxes went offline!  transfer-boxes-dont-have-of-that-type: §cYou don't have Mystery Boxes of that type!  transfer-boxes-dont-have-any: §cYou don't have any Mystery Boxes!  craft-boxes-cant-be-crafted: '&cThis Mystery Box can''t be crafted!'  craft-boxes-not-enough-dust: '&cYou don''t have enough Mystery Dust!'  craft-boxes-crafted: '&eYou have crafted {MYSTERY_BOX}&e!'inventory:  mystery-vault-menu-title: Mystery Vault  confirmation-menu-title: Are you sure?  craft-boxes-menu-title: Craft Boxes  transfer-boxes-menu-title: Transfer Boxes  mystery-vault-empty-slot-item-name: '&7Empty Slot'  mystery-vault-empty-slot-item-lore:  - '&8This slot is empty!'  mystery-vault-craft-boxes-item-name: '&aCraft Boxes'  mystery-vault-craft-boxes-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Craft Mystery Boxes using'  - '&7Mystery Dust.'  - ''  - '&7Available: &d{MYSTERY_DUST} Mystery Dust'  - '&eClick to craft!'  mystery-vault-craft-boxes-go-back-item-name: '&cGo Back'  mystery-vault-craft-boxes-go-back-item-lore:  - '&7Click to go back!'  mystery-vault-craft-box-item-name: '&eCraft &8- {MYSTERY_BOX}'  mystery-vault-craft-box-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Informations:'  - '§a? §7Type: {MYSTERY_BOX}'  - '§a? §7Cost: §d{COST} Mystery Dust'  - ''  - §c§oThis process cannot be undone!  - ''  - '&eClick to craft!'  mystery-vault-statistics-item-name: '&aStatistics'  mystery-vault-statistics-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Mystery Dust: &d{MYSTERY_DUST}'  - ''  - '&eMain Stats'  - '&7Boxes opened: &a{BOXES_OPENED}'  - '&7Boxes transferred: &a{BOXES_TRANSFERRED}'  - '&7Boxes crafted: &a{BOXES_CRAFTED}'  - '&7Dust gained: &a{DUST_GAINED}'  mystery-vault-transfer-boxes-item-name: '&aTransfer Boxes'  mystery-vault-transfer-boxes-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Transfer your Mystery Boxes'  - '&7to another player.'  - ''  - '&7How to transfer:'  - '&a? &7Write player name on chat'  - '  &8Example: ''<player>'' or ''<player> <amount>'''  - '&a? &7Choose Mystery Box type'  - '&a? &7Transfer'  - ''  - '&eClick to transfer!'  transfer-boxes-transfer-box-item-name: '&eTransfer &8- {MYSTERY_BOX}'  transfer-boxes-transfer-box-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Informations:'  - '§a? §7Type: {MYSTERY_BOX}'  - '§a? §7Amount: §e{AMOUNT}'  - '§a? §7Sender: §b{SENDER}'  - '§a? §7Receiver: §b{RECEIVER}'  - ''  - §c§oThis process cannot be undone!  - ''  - '&eClick to transfer!'  confirmation-open-one-item-name: '&eOpen &8- &aSingle Box'  confirmation-open-one-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Open the Mystery Box of'  - '&7that type.'  - ''  - '&c&oThis process cannot be undone!'  - ''  - '&eClick to open!'  confirmation-open-more-item-name: '&eOpen &8- &aMultiple Boxes'  confirmation-open-more-item-lore:  - ''  - '&7Open up to &b5 &7Mystery Boxes'  - '&7of that type.'  - ''  - '&c&oThis process cannot be undone!'  - ''  - '&7Available: &b{AMOUNT} Mystery Boxes'  - '&eClick to open!'  confirmation-go-back-item-name: '&cGo Back'  confirmation-go-back-item-lore:  - '&7Click to go back!'

以上为英文文本希望有大神解析一下

replies.author: a59118196
replies.txt_content: 楼主，这个东西的解析可能需要大量时间与精力，但是楼主的悬赏金额实在有点少，估计很少有人回答

replies.author: 余思思
replies.txt_content:
楼上说严重了，对于会翻译的人来说很快的事情。
但是金粒确实是少了，会翻译但也不会为了少量金粒去帮你翻译。
